title: pingu39
author: pingu39
content: Unstoppable Domains and Polygon Labs launch .polygon domainsDomain extensions are very important for communicating with users. In this sense, it is important news that the provider of Web3 domains, Unstoppable Domains has entered into an agreement with the Polygon network to allow users to register .polygon addresses.Users of the Polygon ecosystem can now open a domain that provides easier access to games, metaverses, applications, wallets, and decentralized websites. It is estimated that over 750 different applications from the Polygon network could benefit from this agreement.More details from the company's official blog:https://polygon.technology/blog/unstoppable-domains-and-polygon-labs-launch-polygon-web3-domains
